single_video_generation.description: Professional businesswoman - single video for all states
single_video_generation.prompt: Medium shot of a professional blonde businesswoman in her 30s sitting at a modern office desk. She wears a light blue blouse and has a natural, confident expression while looking directly at the camera. Natural breathing motion with subtle chest rise and fall. Occasional gentle blinks and very slight head movements. She appears engaged and approachable, with a subtle smile. Clean modern office background with computer and desk accessories. Soft professional lighting illuminating her face evenly. She maintains eye contact and appears ready to help customers. Natural, professional demeanor suitable for customer service.

motion_details.facial: Natural expression, gentle blinks, subtle smile
motion_details.head: Very slight natural movements, maintaining eye contact
motion_details.overall_energy: Calm, professional, approachable, ready to assist

single_video_generation.usage_note: This single video will be used for all conversation states (idle, listening, speaking) with visual effects overlays to indicate different states

visual_effects_instead_of_multiple_video.speaking_state: Blue 'PARLANDO' overlay + slight brightness increase + scale animation
